description:
Ways of Raising Husbands
Snack Moms are still in business. Tonight`s topic would be "talking about husbands." While the five of them talk about themselves raising their children, the words that Mugi said were...
Star - Bunji
In Grandma`s room. Grandma`s good friends, Sakie and Iyo, have come to chat. Bunji brings them snacks and gets caught by the two of them telling him that he`s a handsome man, he`s interesting, and so on. He doesn`t feel that he`s being ill-treated.
Wiener
Fumi has always loved Mom`s poorly-made wiener octopuses. The reason why she calls them Wiener is because, to her, they`re her precious friends that will save her from a tight spot.
Mom Birthday
To moms, their children`s birthday are like their birthdays too. Speaking of which, Mugi`s twins` birthday is coming up soon, so it looks like Mom is coming up with a plan...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ways of Raising Husbands / Star - Bunji / Wiener / Mom Birthday
旦那の育て方 / スター☆ぶんじ / ウインナちゃん / かあさん誕生日
